release_notes: MAJOR FEATURE: Added 978 MHz UAT support for dual SDR configurations. New dump978 container decodes general aviation traffic (US only). Enable via Settings â†’ 978 MHz UAT with second RTL-SDR dongle. Provides 40-50% more aircraft coverage in US. Fully optional - disabled by default. Works on clean installs and updates. Configure via web UI or docker-compose profile.
